text: A Matter of Life and Death is a 1946 British World War II romantic fantasy movie directed by Michael Powell and Emeric Pressburger and starring David Niven, Roger Livesey, Raymond Massey, Kim Hunter, Kathleen Byron, Marius Goring, Joan Maude, Richard Attenborough, Bonar Colleano. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 war movies Category:1946 romance movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:British war movies Category:British romance movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Powell Category:Movies directed by Emeric Pressburger
title: A Matter of Life and Death (movie)
